issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
update readme documentation...

https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/Ti.WKWebView/blob/master/README.md

 to clarify...
preferences, javaScriptEnabled: true

requires...
<property name="run-on-main-thread" type="bool">true</property>
in tiapp.xml.

Or the wkwebview will stop working.
fields.summary: Update readme.md for wkwebview javaScriptEnabled has tiapp.xml run-on-main-thread dependency on

comments.body: Please create a pull request there. We will take care of it. Thanks.
